title: Dynamic Bounty
author: Dynamic Bounty
created_time: October 02, 2022, 02:49:15 AMLast edit: October 06, 2022, 09:58:01 AM by Dynamic Bounty

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Stop wasting your time and ours too. You are only  3 posts here and you want to run a bounty management without a record. It will be hard to find someone to trust you. But best of luck.

comments.author: Dynamic Bounty
comments.body: I'm trying to get a bounty and I got a project then I'm posting this with a new ID but I don't know why the photos aren't showing because I'm no longer a member or a copper member.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Dynamic Bounty on October 02, 2022, 06:31:42 AMI'm trying to get a bounty and I got a project then I'm posting this with a new ID but I don't know why the photos aren't showing because I'm no longer a member or a copper member.If what you mean is that you have another account in which you bought the copper membership, you have to know that it is not inherited from that one. You will have to buy another copper membership for this account if you want to post images.On the other hand, it would be better if the other account has been around for a while, and you want to get customers to say which one it is or point it out with a neutral tag. Nobody is going to hire a newbie that nobody knows and who doesn't speak English well to manage bounties.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Dynamic Bounty on October 02, 2022, 06:31:42 AMI'm trying to get a bounty and I got a project then I'm posting this with a new ID but I don't know why the photos aren't showing because I'm no longer a member or a copper member.you run a bounty campaign, but that does not mean that you have already grown into a bounty manager, after all, it's a start. Since you already know about posting images and copper member possibilities (I assume this is your alt account), why don't you pay for that membership? So your ANN threads will look completely different. Who wants to pay you for opening a topic, where the images are actually just URLs?if you really want to manage bounty campaigns, you have to put in more effort.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: Dynamic Bounty on October 02, 2022, 06:31:42 AMI'm trying to get a bounty and I got a project then I'm posting this with a new ID but I don't know why the photos aren't showing because I'm no longer a member or a copper member.Why not use your account which handle a campaign already since for sure if you can show a portfolio maybe you can get a campaign here. But for having that account which cannot post a picture with no experience show I doubt you can get one here.To avoid misconceptions about your main intention better use one account and build a reputation since from that more projects will came plus no one will think about how shady you are.

comments.author: Dynamic Bounty

But for having that account which cannot post a picture with no experience show I doubt you can get one here.To avoid misconceptions about your main intention better use one account and build a reputation since from that more projects will came plus no one will think about how shady you are.Thank you For everything thanks alot for suggested me

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: What you have shown indicates a good experience in design and not in managing campaigns, campaign management requires someone who is good at dealing with data, from which he analyzes people’s posts for you and determines the most appropriate posts according to what the signature campaign requires, and he may use some functions to predict how to distribute posts, including opportunities to view signature and click on himUsing a newbie account with just a few posts is a bad way to introduce yourself.
